last_episode_to_air.name: In Our Midst
last_episode_to_air.overview: Becker's involvement in a criminal conspiracy sparks an investigation by Toby, Michelle and Dev.

name: The Listener
overview: Toby Logan is a highly skilled paramedic with a secret – he can read minds. Toby never really knew his parents and grew up in foster care, this coupled with his secret, which he shares with no one, has made him a bit of a loner. Until now, Toby has kept his ability hidden, exploring its possibilities only with his long time mentor and confidante Dr. Ray Mercer.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Toby Logan is faced with a hostile colleague from the past in Detective Sergeant Becker, and eventually come into conflict with the goals and procedures of the Integrated Investigative Bureau (IIB). Meanwhile, Michelle is determined to have it all, working to balance her demanding career and the challenges of first-time parenthood with husband Adam. And Toby’s best friend, Oz Bey, embarks on a second career and new professional adventure when he decides to open a swanky gastro-pub.

episodes.name: I'm an Adult Now
episodes.overview: When Toby rescues a young woman of a terrible car accident, he starts having disturbing visions of the son of the woman, who has gone missing. The woman is traumatized and scared for being kidnapped to gun point. As the worry for the situation of the child increases, Toby realizes that it he is going to have to act fast to find a sense to the mental discords that are tormenting him.

episodes.name: Emotional Rescue
episodes.overview: Toby rescues an old friend from a building fire and begins hunting a serial arsonist.

episodes.name: A Voice in the Dark
episodes.overview: Visions of a missing girl prompt Toby to pursue a homeless man, who he thinks has information on her location. Soon, Toby begins to suspect that the man may also have psychic abilities.

episodes.name: Some Kinda Love
episodes.overview: Toby becomes a murder suspect after he leaves a nightclub with a woman who turns up dead the next day.

episodes.name: Lisa Says
episodes.overview: A troubled boy runs away from the hospital after narrowly escaping a gang beating. While trying to find him, Toby encounters a group of runaways and discovers that a young girl is also missing.

episodes.name: Foggy Notion
episodes.overview: Toby becomes attached to the sister of a murder victim shot in Chinatown and uses his telepathy to find the killer. He soon uncovers a link between the shooting and a Chinese crime boss.

episodes.name: Iris
episodes.overview: Toby watches a woman with healing powers tend to an injured baby. When he befriends her, he learns she feels similarly burdened by her gift.

episodes.name: One Way or Another
episodes.overview: Toby gathers information from a traumatized rape victim whose attacker Marks failed to convict in the past. During his probe, Toby discovers Marks may have a deeper connection to the case.

episodes.name: Inside Man
episodes.overview: Toby works with a traumatized teen who was left unable to speak after the death of his parents in an attempt to discover what happened during the accident that killed them.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: Toby works on a missing-person case in hopes of receiving a $100,000 reward, which he wants to use to save the nearly bankrupt restaurant owned by Oz's family. The case, however, proves more complicated than Toby anticipated.

episodes.name: Beginning to See the Light
episodes.overview: Toby suspects foul play in the death of a hit-and-run victim who was convicted of embezzlement.

episodes.name: My Sister's Keeper
episodes.overview: Toby and Oz compromise evidence at a crime scene while treating a victim, whose sister may have information about the attack.

episodes.name: The Journey
episodes.overview: Toby looks for answers about his past and his mother by sifting through the jumbled thoughts of an Alzheimer's patient.

episodes.name: Lady in the Lake
episodes.overview: Toby, still haunted by guilt over the murder of his friend Detective Charlie Marks and the disappearance of his mother – has resolved to stop fighting against his mysterious gift and use his telepathic abilities to help others. When he revives a woman who nearly drowned, her amnesia gives him the perfect opportunity. As he sets out to help her remember her past, she’s also being investigated by Sgt. Michelle McCluskey of the IIB, who has taken a special interest in Toby’s connection to the woman and uncovered his more than coincidental history with a number of major criminal cases in the past.

episodes.name: Crime Seen
episodes.overview: Sgt. McCluskey recruits Toby on a case involving smuggled weapons, which takes a turn for the worse when an undercover operative winds up dead.

episodes.name: In His Sights
episodes.overview: Toby investigates an assassination threat against a high-ranking military colonel who may have been involved in the mysterious disappearance of an army private.

episodes.name: The Brothers Volkov
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle investigate a suspicious homicide when a Russian Consul General is found dead and his son, protected by diplomatic immunity, confesses to his murder.

episodes.name: Inner Circle
episodes.overview: Toby is brought in to investigate corrupt cops, but finds himself in over his head when one of them ends up dead from a suspected drug overdose.

episodes.name: The Magician
episodes.overview: When an imprisoned criminal mastermind holds the key to the whereabouts of a kidnapped judge, Sgt. Michelle McCluskey brings in Toby to read him, with unexpected results.

episodes.name: Ace in the Hole
episodes.overview: The death of a CSIS agent and a breach of classified intelligence prompt Michelle to turn to her estranged husband and Toby to infiltrate a high-stakes poker game.

episodes.name: Vanished
episodes.overview: A mysterious woman with an unexplained psychic gift may hold the key to helping Toby uncover the whereabouts of a wealthy businessman's kidnapped baby.

episodes.name: Jericho
episodes.overview: Toby goes undercover to help expose the identity of a hacker known as “Jericho-11” in a cyber crime investigation involving large-scale identity theft.

episodes.name: Desperate Hours
episodes.overview: Toby and Oz are taken hostage by two men posing as security guards when they are dispatched to a routine call in the financial district.

episodes.name: To Die For
episodes.overview: Sgt. McCluskey, with the help of Toby, tries to determine if a mob boss is really behind the murder of Will Sterling, the business partner of a celebrated restaurant chef.

episodes.name: Eye of the Storm
episodes.overview: Toby helps Sgt. McCluskey uncover who is behind the leak of government information and a sex tape featuring the Minister of Foreign Affairs.

episodes.name: Reckoning
episodes.overview: Toby connects with a gifted young woman whose mental powers appear to rival or even surpass his own who maybe connected to a series of suspicious suicides linked to an old biker gang.

episodes.name: The Bank Job
episodes.overview: Despite his decision to stop using his telepathic abilities, Toby is forced to use them when he finds himself hostage in the middle of a bank heist. It will take all of Toby's skills, both as a paramedic and a mind reader, to keep him and his fellow hostages alive.

episodes.name: Cold Case Blues
episodes.overview: Working his first official investigation, Toby must contend with Alvin Klein's skepticism and personal agenda in solving a decade-old murder.

episodes.name: Curtain Call
episodes.overview: After a member of a superstar performer’s crew is electrocuted by a microphone, Toby finds himself amidst the entourage of Jade, one of pop music’s most popular and innovative performers.

episodes.name: The Taking
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle investigate the abduction of an African teenager whose driver/bodyguard, Kwesi, was shot during the altercation.

episodes.name: Rogues' Gallery
episodes.overview: Toby uses his telepathy as surveillance when Michelle goes undercover to bust a violent art theft ring.

episodes.name: She Sells Sanctuary
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle investigate the link between a cult and the disappearance of three young women.

episodes.name: Poisoned Minds
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle investigate the death of a pharmaceutical executive who released a drug with killer results.

episodes.name: Now You See Him
episodes.overview: When Magnus Elphrenson escapes prison again, Toby must help Michelle recapture him before the criminal mastermind seeks vengeance on his nemesis.

episodes.name: Crossed
episodes.overview: Toby starts doubting his abilities after Michelle questions the veracity of his insights during their investigation into a wealthy philanthropist's murder.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.overview: Toby and the IIB race to track the source of a deadly virus before the outbreak claims any more lives.

episodes.name: Captain Nightfall
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle investigate a series of violent home invasions, which are being interrupted by a vigilante citizen dressed as a superhero.

episodes.name: The Bro Code
episodes.overview: Oz unwittingly puts his life in danger after he convinces Toby to help a childhood friend who witnessed a murder.

episodes.name: The Shooting
episodes.overview: With Michelle's career on the line, Toby and the IIB must prove she was set up after a bad tip led to the shooting of a suspect.

episodes.name: Blast from the Past
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle investigate a string of high-tech thefts in Vancouver. Toby’s personal life also heats up as his relationship grows with crime reporter Tia Tremblay, who is inexplicably the one person he can’t read. Meanwhile, new director of emergency services Oz Bey realizes that being the boss is harder than he expected.

episodes.name: The Blue Line
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle track a gang of robbers armed with lethal, high-powered bullets under the additional pressure of a demanding new police superintendent.

episodes.name: Early Checkout
episodes.overview: Toby pushes for an investigation when his girlfriend Tia suspects her hospitalized colleague was targeted after writing a scathing exposé of an influential hotel owner.

episodes.name: Cold Storage
episodes.overview: After a body is found in a storage locker filled with stolen goods, Toby and Michelle must find the killer who may have taken national defense secrets.

episodes.name: Buckle Up
episodes.overview: Toby goes undercover to find a group of thieves posing as police officers.

episodes.name: Witness for the Prosecution
episodes.overview: When the key witness in a mob murder trial is shot, Toby and Michelle must contend with a suspicious FBI agent as they unravel a potential conspiracy linked to the original killing and retaliation.

episodes.name: Caged In
episodes.overview: After Toby witnesses the suspicious death of a promising, young Mixed Martial Arts fighter, he probes the nefarious business dealings of two rival leagues.

episodes.name: The Illustrated Woman
episodes.overview: Toby's investigation into the murder of a tattooed woman leads him to believe that corporate espionage and blackmail are behind the killing.

episodes.name: Love's a Bitch
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle investigate the killing of a British spy whose dalliances on an adulterous dating site might have led to his murder.

episodes.name: The Long Con
episodes.overview: In an effort to snag an elusive human trafficker, Toby and Michelle team with a career con artist.

episodes.name: House of Horror
episodes.overview: Toby and Michelle investigate the murder of an actor during the filming of an allegedly cursed horror movie.

episodes.name: False I.D.
episodes.overview: When Toby and Michelle go after a suspect in the murder of a Latin crime boss, their case is halted by interference from the police superintendent.

episodes.name: Fatal Vision
episodes.overview: After shooting and killing a suspect, Toby struggles with post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) as the IIB tries to stop an assassination.

episodes.name: The Wrong Man
episodes.overview: Toby and Dev investigate a serial killer who leaves live snakes with his victims, echoing the calling card of a past culprit who Michelle had previously put behind bars. Meanwhile, Michelle is trying to enjoy her maternity leave with her new baby girl and husband Adam but when her credibility is doubted with the suggestion that she may have arrested the wrong suspect, she must return to the IIB in order to save her professional reputation.

episodes.name: The Lockup
episodes.overview: A former IIB colleague returns and ends up jeopardizing the team's success.

episodes.name: Dancing with the Enemy
episodes.overview: Toby and the IIB team investigate the abduction of a ballerina after Tia tips them to corruption at a dance company.

episodes.name: Smoke and Mirrors
episodes.overview: While the team investigates a botched magic stunt that killed an investment guru, Becker’s scrutiny of Toby threatens to expose his secret.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: On the eve of his new video game release, Dev's former friend is murdered.

episodes.name: Man in the Mirror
episodes.overview: Toby faces a mentally unstable suspect in the murder investigation of a psychiatrist.

episodes.name: Amuse Bouche
episodes.overview: The team investigates the murder of a cooking show contestant, poisoned on live television.

episodes.name: White Whale
episodes.overview: A mayoral candidate is questioned for murder after Becker becomes interested in Toby's gift.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.overview: The team must find a treasure in order to solve the murder of a man responsible for a coin heist.

episodes.name: Family Secrets
episodes.overview: While investigating the murder of a billionaire playboy, Toby's curiosities about his family arise.

episodes.name: Zero Recall
episodes.overview: After being drugged, Toby is implicated in an armed kidnapping.

episodes.name: An Innocent Man
episodes.overview: Toby goes under cover when he believes an innocent man is taking the fall for a murder.

episodes.name: In Our Midst
episodes.overview: Becker's involvement in a criminal conspiracy sparks an investigation by Toby, Michelle and Dev.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Toby Logan is faced with a hostile colleague from the past in Detective Sergeant Becker, and eventually come into conflict with the goals and procedures of the Integrated Investigative Bureau (IIB). Meanwhile, Michelle is determined to have it all, working to balance her demanding career and the challenges of first-time parenthood with husband Adam. And Toby’s best friend, Oz Bey, embarks on a second career and new professional adventure when he decides to open a swanky gastro-pub.
